mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.qy_tysh AS "qyTysh", a.qymc AS "qymc", a.qydz AS "qydz", a.qylxfs AS "qylxfs", a.qy_yx AS "qyYx", a.qy_lxr AS "qyLxr", a.qy_lxrdh AS "qyLxrdh", a.qy_prov AS "qyProv", a.qy_city AS "qyCity", a.qy_area AS "qyArea", a.qy_gsxz AS "qyGsxz", a.qy_hylb AS "qyHylb", a.qy_gsgm AS "qyGsgm", a.qy_gswz AS "qyGswz", a.qy_frdbxm AS "qyFrdbxm", a.qy_zczj AS "qyZczj", a.qy_gsjs AS "qyGsjs", a.qy_zcsj AS "qyZcsj", a.qy_frsfz AS "qyFrsfz", a.qy_yyzzzp AS "qyYyzzzp", a.qy_frsfzzp AS "qyFrsfzzp", a.qybq AS "qybq", a.memo AS "memo", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bckj_biz_qyxx a
AND a.qy_tysh = #{qyTysh}
AND( a.state = 1 OR a.state = 2 OR a.state = 3)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_qyxx( owid, qy_tysh, qymc, qydz, qylxfs, qy_yx, qy_lxr, qy_lxrdh, qy_prov, qy_city, qy_area, qy_gsxz, qy_hylb, qy_gsgm, qy_gswz, qy_frdbxm, qy_zczj, qy_gsjs, qy_zcsj, qy_frsfz, qy_yyzzzp, qy_frsfzzp, qybq, memo, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{qyTysh}, #{qymc}, #{qydz}, #{qylxfs}, #{qyYx}, #{qyLxr}, #{qyLxrdh}, #{qyProv}, #{qyCity}, #{qyArea}, #{qyGsxz}, #{qyHylb}, #{qyGsgm}, #{qyGswz}, #{qyFrdbxm}, #{qyZczj}, #{qyGsjs}, #{qyZcsj}, #{qyFrsfz}, #{qyYyzzzp}, #{qyFrsfzzp}, #{qybq}, #{memo}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_qyxx SET owid = #{owid}, qy_tysh = #{qyTysh}, qymc = #{qymc}, qydz = #{qydz}, qylxfs = #{qylxfs}, qy_yx = #{qyYx}, qy_lxr = #{qyLxr}, qy_lxrdh = #{qyLxrdh}, qy_prov = #{qyProv}, qy_city = #{qyCity}, qy_area = #{qyArea}, qy_gsxz = #{qyGsxz}, qy_hylb = #{qyHylb}, qy_gsgm = #{qyGsgm}, qy_gswz = #{qyGswz}, qy_frdbxm = #{qyFrdbxm}, qy_zczj = #{qyZczj}, qy_gsjs = #{qyGsjs}, qy_zcsj = #{qyZcsj}, qy_frsfz = #{qyFrsfz}, qy_yyzzzp = #{qyYyzzzp}, qy_frsfzzp = #{qyFrsfzzp}, qybq = #{qybq}, memo = #{memo}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select: select c.yh_ref_owid as yhRefOwid , c.bmsj as bmsj , c.lxdh as lxdh , c.lxr as lxr from bckj_biz_job b , bckj_biz_jybm c where b.owid =#{jobOwid} and c.job_ref_owid = b.owid and c.bmlx=1
select c.yh_ref_owid as yhRefOwid ,c.gzsj as gzsj, c.lxdh as lxdh ,c.lxr as lxr from bckj_biz_job b , bckj_biz_xsgz c where b.owid =#{jobOwid} and c.job_ref_owid = b.owid and c.xxlb=0
